valueDomain.name: Force
valueDomain.description: A force is a push or pull upon an object resulting from the object's interaction with another object.

unitOfMeasure.name: Newton
unitOfMeasure.description: The newton (symbol: N) is the International System of Units (SI) derived unit of force.

dataType.name: Decimal
dataType.description: A number that uses a decimal point followed by digits that show a value smaller than one.
